snippet: Mireia Belmonte García of Spain claimed her third gold medal of the world short-course championships as she won the 800-meter freestyle.
abstract: Mireia Belmonte Garcia of Spain wins 800-meter freestyle, claiming her third gold medal at world short-course championships; other swimming news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mireia Belmonte García of Spain claimed her third gold medal of the world short-course championships as she won the 800-meter freestyle.
